meanings.definition: In a manner related to the arrangement and appearance of printed matter.
meanings.sent1: The text was arranged typographically to make it easy to read.
meanings.sent2: She organized the document typographically to improve its visual appeal.
meanings.sent3: The typographically aligned paragraphs made the book look neat and tidy.
meanings.sent4: His resume was typographically perfect, standing out among the others.
meanings.sent5: The typographically designed poster caught everyone's attention at the event.

meanings.sent1: The typographically pleasing font enhanced the overall design of the website.
meanings.sent2: She admired the typographically interesting book cover at the bookstore.
meanings.sent3: The typographically creative logo sparked a lot of interest in the brand.
meanings.sent4: His typographically inspired artwork was displayed in a prestigious gallery.
meanings.sent5: The typographically sophisticated magazine layout impressed the readers.
